attributes.action: call upon charity organisations to stop demonising men and acknowledge that over 100 independent studies have shown that domestic violence and violence towards children is just as likely to be perpetrated by women.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Domestic violence wherever it occurs is terrible. However, I have become increasingly frustrated by both the government and charity organisations continuously stating the myth that DV is a "man on woman" issue. The figures they use rely on crime statistics only-not on the results of many research papers which show this is simply not true. This is a social issue, not a gender issue and will not be resolved until such a time as women are stopped treated as victims and men as demons.
